title: Russillo Book Club: 'Led Zeppelin: The Biography' by Bob Spitz. Plus, Life Advice.
description:
Russillo is joined by journalist and author Bob Spitz to discuss his biography of Led Zeppelin (0:36). Then, Ryen answers some listener-submitted Life Advice questions (39:51).

Host: Ryen Russillo
Guest: Bob Spitz
Producers: Kyle Crichton and Steve Ceruti
